sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffrct, useContext } from 'react';
import axios from 'axios';
import { Context } from '../../context';
import { Card, Form, Col, Button} from 'react-bootstrap'
export default function SearchInput() {
    return (
        <Card className="mb-4 p-5">
            <Card.Header className="text-center display-4">
                Search For A Song
            </Card.Header>
            <Card.Body>
                <Card.Title className="text-center">
                    Get the lyrics for any song
                </Card.Title>
                <Card.Text>
                    <Form>
                        <Form.Row>
                            <Form.Group as={Col} md={{offset:2,span:8}} controlId="formBasicSearch">
                                <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="enter..." />
                            </Form.Group>
                            <Form.Group as="Col">
                                <Button type="submit">Search</Button>
                            </Form.Group>
                        </Form.Row>
                    </Form>
                </Card.Text>
            </Card.Body>
        </Card>
    )
}
